entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
